GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v4.9.326
GSD.description:
spmi: trace: fix stack-out-of-bound access in SPMI tracing functions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit 80f7c93e573ea9f524924bb529c2af8cb28b1c43, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit a9fce374815d8ab94a3e6259802a944e2cc21408. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: spmi: trace: fix stack-out-of-bound access in SPMI tracing functions
